translation: Change the music that plays during battle.
source: Change the music that plays during battle.

translation: Connect to PlayStation®Store to purchase downloadable content.
source: Connect to PlayStation®Store to purchase downloadable content.

translation: This will end the current game. Are you sure?
source: This will end the current game. Are you sure?

translation: You must end your game before connecting to PlayStation®Store.{LF}Would you like to save your current progress?
source: You must end your game before connecting to PlayStation®Store.{LF}Would you like to save your current progress?

translation: Connect to PlayStation®Store without saving?{LF}All unsaved progress will be lost.
source: Connect to PlayStation®Store without saving?{LF}All unsaved progress will be lost.

translation: You must sign in with your Sony Entertainment Network account to access this option.
source: You must sign in with your Sony Entertainment Network account to access this option.

translation: The parental control settings on your Sony Entertainment Network account prevent you from using online services.
source: The parental control settings on your Sony Entertainment Network account prevent you from using online services.

translation: Switch the voice language used in the main game.
source: Switch the voice language used in the main game.
